object.name: BackgroundFillFreeformGradient
object.description: The background is a freeform gradient that rotates after every message in the chat.
object.html_description: The background is a freeform gradient that rotates after every message in the chat.
object.rst_description: The background is a freeform gradient that rotates after every message in the chat.

annotations.description: Type of the background fill, always 'freeform_gradient'
annotations.rst_description: Type of the background fill, always 'freeform_gradient'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: A list of the 3 or 4 base colors that are used to generate the freeform gradient in the RGB24 format
annotations.html_description: A list of the 3 or 4 base colors that are used to generate the freeform gradient in the RGB24 format
annotations.rst_description: A list of the 3 or 4 base colors that are used to generate the freeform gradient in the RGB24 format
annotations.name: colors
